featured.text: Since then, other companies have jumped on the bandwagon to promote everything from soft drinks to new clothes as a 27 .

definition.zh_def: 流行的趨勢或潮流，尤其是指人們因為其他人參與而跟隨的行為。
definition.en_def: A popular trend or activity that many people join in, often because others are doing it.
definition.example: Everyone started using the new app, so I decided to jump on the bandwagon too.
